Text: A New Arrival Cc my pleasure to announce Scott and Barbara Pleus as the proud parents of a new baby girl Catherine Cati Elizabeth born Saturday April at pm Cati weighed in at a bouncing lbs and ounces and stretched out to inches in length Due to the new arrival Scott Pleus will be out of the office all of this week If there are any meetings or appointments that needs Scotts immediate attention please contact me at In addition Scott will be checking into the office regularly and can be reached at home during day hours Again please join me in saying Congratulations to the Pleus family on their new arrival Thank you Inga Latson Scott Pleus Office Home Pager Cellular
